actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide that warrant officers of a uniformed service who accept appointments as commissioned officers shall not receive less than the pay and allowances to which they were previously entitled as warrant officers.

summary.text: Provides that warrant officers of a uniformed service who accept appointments as commissioned officers shall not receive less than the regular pay and allowances to which they were previously entitled as warrant officers.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide that warrant officers of a uniformed service who accept appointments as commissioned officers shall not receive less than the pay and allowances to which they were previously entitled as warrant officers.
